caption.p: Power spectra for time‐series of global annual net biome production (NBP), net primary production (NPP), heterotrophic respiration (RH), and disturbance (D), as simulated by the Community Earth System Model Last Millennium Ensemble (CESM‐LME) in the single‐forcing runs (greenhouse gases [GHGs], land use and land cover change [LULCC], orbital, solar, and volcanic), as well as the 13 full‐forcing ensemble members and the 850‐year control simulation.
